sentences.english: The third year in the spring, which is also the flying swallow, and they disappeared .
sentences.chinese: 第三年春天，这对燕子又飞来了，它们又不见了燕巢。

sentences.english: Barn Swallow nest at Kwun Tong is now raising the second brood this year.
sentences.chinese: 观塘市中心的一个家燕巢，今天已在育第二窝了。
